about.summary: Colorize your text for the terminal

name: rb-colorator
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "colorator" %}
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: e2f85daf57af47d740db2a32191d1bdfb0f6503a0dfbc8327d0c9154d5ddfc38

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'puts "blue".blue; exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE
  summary: Colorize your text for the terminal

  doc_url: http://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/octopress/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
